Text: Hey, this game is great and all, but I have to keep starting all over, and keep losing all my data. I need the serial code to fix the problem, can someone please add it to the comments or description? thanks in advance, great game.

This is a fix for the x0ffffff error, no probs:

1: Make sure Windows update service is running, this is very important!

2: Install GfWL - or just install 'Windows Live ID Sign-in Assistant 6.5', if you already have GfWL installed.

3: Delete any 'xlive.dll' you may have downloaded and put into the game folder.

4: Reset if required, then play the game. Also, EASY. :p
